bibl.title: The Homeric Hymn to Dionysus: P. Oxy. 670.
bibl.note: Two points of vocabulary might suggest a date in the Hellenistic period or later. The occurrence of these two words should at least give pause for thought whether P. Oxy. IV, 670 (= M.-P.3 1231.1; LDAB 2050) 670 originally formed part of the first Homeric Hymn.
bibl.seg: FAULKNER Andrew, The Homeric Hymn to Dionysus: P. Oxy. 670.
